Package org.lwjgl.bullet

Class B3PhysicsSimulationParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3PhysicsSimulationParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3PhysicsSimulationParameters
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3PhysicsSimulationParameters {
     double m_deltaTime;
     double m_gravityAcceleration[3];
     int m_numSimulationSubSteps;
     int m_numSolverIterations;
     int m_useRealTimeSimulation;
     int m_useSplitImpulse;
     double m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold;
     double m_contactBreakingThreshold;
     int m_internalSimFlags;
     double m_defaultContactERP;
     int m_collisionFilterMode;
     int m_enableFileCaching;
     double m_restitutionVelocityThreshold;
     double m_defaultNonContactERP;
     double m_frictionERP;
     double m_defaultGlobalCFM;
     double m_frictionCFM;
     int m_enableConeFriction;
     int m_deterministicOverlappingPairs;
     double m_allowedCcdPenetration;
     int m_jointFeedbackMode;
     double m_solverResidualThreshold;
     double m_contactSlop;
     int m_enableSAT;
     int m_constraintSolverType;
     int m_minimumSolverIslandSize;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3PhysicsSimulationParameters

        public B3PhysicsSimulationParameters​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3PhysicsSimulationParameters instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
